Material used.Description: Transgenic mice overexpressing SNCA A53T mutation were used for behavioral testing.

Readout description.Result Description: Transgenic mice exhibited increased α-synuclein aggregation and motor deficits compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent groups of transgenic mice were tested.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice served as negative controls.

Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Normal: Wild-type mice showed no motor deficits (p > 0.05).
Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Abnormal: Transgenic mice showed significant motor deficits (p < 0.01).

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Dopamine measurement in SNCA A30P mice

Material used.Description: Transgenic mice with SNCA A30P mutation were used to measure dopamine levels.

Readout description.Result Description: SNCA A30P mice showed reduced dopamine levels in the striatum compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Five mice per group were tested.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice served as negative controls.

Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Normal: Wild-type mice showed dopamine levels within physiological range (p > 0.05).
Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Abnormal: SNCA A30P mice showed significantly reduced dopamine levels (p < 0.01).

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Motor function tests in LRRK2 G2019S mice

Material used.Description: Transgenic mice with LRRK2 G2019S mutation were tested for motor function.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S mice exhibited impaired motor coordination and increased phosphorylation of α-synuclein.

Biological replicates.Description: Six mice per group were tested.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice served as negative controls.

Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Normal: Wild-type mice showed normal motor coordination (p > 0.05).
Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Abnormal: LRRK2 G2019S mice showed significant motor impairment (p < 0.01).

Experiment Method.Assay Method: α-synuclein accumulation in GBA N370S mice

Material used.Description: GBA N370S knock-in mice were analyzed for α-synuclein accumulation in the brain.

Readout description.Result Description: GBA N370S mice exhibited increased α-synuclein accumulation in the substantia nigra compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Four mice per group were tested.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice served as negative controls.

Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Normal: Wild-type mice showed no significant α-synuclein accumulation (p > 0.05).
Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Abnormal: GBA N370S mice showed significant α-synuclein accumulation (p < 0.01).

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Mitochondrial function analysis in PARK2 R169H mice

Material used.Description: PARK2 R169H knockout mice were tested for mitochondrial function in dopaminergic neurons.

Readout description.Result Description: PARK2 R169H mice showed impaired mitochondrial complex I activity in dopaminergic neurons.

Biological replicates.Description: Three mice per group were tested.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice served as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice served as negative controls.

Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Normal: Wild-type mice showed normal mitochondrial complex I activity (p > 0.05).
Thresholds for Normal/Abnormal.Abnormal: PARK2 R169H mice showed significant mitochondrial dysfunction (p < 0.01).
